General.Name: Terminus Energy Inc
General.Description: Terminus Energy, Inc., a development stage company, focuses on the development and sale of electric power generation products. It intends to offer TE-50 system, a solid oxide fuel cell for electric power providers, including commercial utilities; IPPs; and industrial customers, as well as the military. The company was formerly known as Quintessence Holdings Inc. and changed its name to Terminus Energy, Inc. in May 2009. Terminus Energy, Inc. was founded in 1993 and is based in Torrance, California.
General.Address: 2214 Torrance Boulevard, Torrance, CA, United States, 90501
